title: Textile, 1920s
medium:
Medium: silk and cotton
Technique: 2 & 1 twill damask. Weft has been spun with yellow cotton slub yarns;  green silk warp is "jaspe".
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 67 x 63 cm (26 3/8 x 24 13/16 in.)
description: Floral forms in leaf scroll in green, yellow and beige.

1920s. Medium: silk and cotton
